sentences.english: Objective To investigate clinical and pathological feature of death cases due to pericardial tamponade.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨因心包填塞死亡的临床与病理特征。

sentences.english: Preoperative massive transfusion and pericardiocentesis are not advocated.
sentences.chinese: 不提倡术前大量扩容及心包穿刺。

sentences.english: Metastases may lead to a hemorrhagic pericarditis.
sentences.chinese: 转移性肿瘤可导致出血性心包炎。

sentences.english: Abdominal distension has been described as the most common presenting symptom in children with constrictive pericarditis.
sentences.chinese: 小儿患有紧缩性心包膜炎通常以腹胀为最常见之症状。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical value of B-Us-guided pericardiocentesis .

sentences.english: It is really just fibrinous pericarditis with hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 但是它仅为纤维素性心包炎合并出血。

sentences.english: Increased CVP can be caused by pericarditis or right-sided heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 中心静脉压的升高可由心包炎或右心衰竭引起。

sentences.english: There was a small pleural effusion and no evidence of pericardial constriction.
sentences.chinese: 有少量胸腔积液，没有心包收缩的证据。

sentences.english: It is really just fibrinous pericarditis with hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 实质上是纤维素性心包炎伴出血。

sentences.english: We report a case of tuberculous pericarditis which presented with syndrome of inappropriate secretion of antidiuretic hormone (SIADH).
sentences.chinese: 一位结核性心包膜炎并SIADH的病例报告。

sentences.english: This is typical for a fibrinous pericarditis .
sentences.chinese: 这是典型的纤维素性心包炎的病例。

sentences.english: This is another example of fibrinous pericarditis .
sentences.chinese: 这是纤维素性心包炎的又一实例。

sentences.english: Suture a large bovine pericardial patch to simulate acute left ventricular aneurysm.
sentences.chinese: 补入大的牛心包片模拟室壁瘤。

sentences.english: For this reason, the pericardium is usually regarded as an attachment to the heart.
sentences.chinese: 因此，心包通常被认为是心的附属。

sentences.english: Without inflammation, blood in the pericardial sac would be called "hemopericardium".
sentences.chinese: 在心包腔里没有炎症仅有出血，称作心包积血。
